title: I am looking for a mid-high gold to duo with.
body:
Just looking for a mid-high gold player who can hold their own to duo with.

ign: whitepumah

replies.body: You think peaking at gold 4 is something to be proud of after four years of constant play? You are clearly not cut out to play this game. Your attitude towards the game is disgusting; instead of admitting you're a shit and heavily unskilled player, you decide to shift the blame towards luck? Don't talk back to me kid, until you've peaked Diamond I in Solo Queue and top 20 Challenger in OCE Flex. Look at the overwhelming number of downvotes on your post. Clearly no one here likes you, keep your opinions to yourself because no one else is here to back you up. Want to prove me wrong? Get better at the game, quit bitching and demonstrate to me that you are indeed a good player who 'deserves to play competitively'as you have stated so in so many of your previous posts. See ya :D {{champion:29}} {{champion:82}}

> [{quoted}](name=lmperius,realm=OCE,application-id=mR0UmRrp,discussion-id=YgF4EHYt,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2017-02-14T06:12:42.361+0000)
>
> You think peaking at gold 4 is something to be proud of after four years of constant play? You are clearly not cut out to play this game. Your attitude towards the game is disgusting; instead of admitting you're a shit and heavily unskilled player, you decide to shift the blame towards luck? Don't talk back to me kid, until you've peaked Diamond I in Solo Queue and top 20 Challenger in OCE Flex. Look at the overwhelming number of downvotes on your post. Clearly no one here likes you, keep your opinions to yourself because no one else is here to back you up. Want to prove me wrong? Get better at the game, quit bitching and demonstrate to me that you are indeed a good player who 'deserves to play competitively'as you have stated so in so many of your previous posts. See ya :D {{champion:29}} {{champion:82}}

Hard to demonstrate to someone who can't see what is in front of them.

Your opinion of me is meaningless to me, I have nothing to prove to you, you are not my target audience, I did not ask for you to comment on my post, I don't want trolls on my thread.

I mean if you've been struggling to climb out of silver elo for 4 years in a fucking row then you probably deserve to stay in that elo. One million XP mastery points on Twitch and you still play poorly. I'll give you two basic tips as a starting point - build some fucking boots and play actual champs, maybe then you'll find yourself climbing. This comment is on behalf of those who down voted your post. {{champion:110}}  {{champion:202}} {{champion:126}} {{champion:42}} {{champion:22}} {{champion:164}}

> [{quoted}](name=lmperius,realm=OCE,application-id=mR0UmRrp,discussion-id=YgF4EHYt,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-02-13T06:40:02.381+0000)
>
> probably deserve to stay in that elo.

Are you saying that you are unsure but are basing your claim on a "more than likely"? That would ironically suggest that you are relying on luck being in your favour to support your claim, in a game that literally relies on luck before your own actions even become relevant. I mean, I have already climbed out of silver and have peaked at gold 4 which already invalidates your first sentence. Which means you assumed it. You then assumed that I play poorly, you must think so badly of all the gold-plat-diamond teams I seem to consistently perform against. Then you try to give me tips as if your previous statements were true in the first place, then you give bad advice which I have already been obliged to test in the past and it failed. After all that garbage you then claim that the comment was on behalf of all the people who simply do not like me because of my opinion which has yet to be disproved which further devalues your statements.

Do yourselves a favour and stop wasting your time trying to cut down what you don't understand.

>Consistantly perform against

http://imgur.com/a/af5nH Oh yeah baby

> [{quoted}](name=Ryuku,realm=OCE,application-id=mR0UmRrp,discussion-id=YgF4EHYt,comment-id=000100010000,timestamp=2017-02-14T02:14:38.750+0000)
>
> http://imgur.com/a/af5nH Oh yeah baby

Well done, you managed to pick the only game I went negative.

Like I said, consistently, not always.
Idk why people are downvoting this. Silly people...
